IS
-- Table API package for table lm_package_attributes
-- Generated by VI TAPI generator version 6.2  (TAPI generated 03-Jan-2022  05:41:13)

-- Generated global constants

g_lock_conflicts  PLS_INTEGER := 0;


FUNCTION pka_select_row( i_pka_ID   IN  lm_package_attributes.ID%TYPE
                       , o_rt_pka   OUT lm_package_attributes%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION pka_select_row_uk1( i_pka_NAME   IN  lm_package_attributes.NAME%TYPE
                           , o_rt_pka  OUT lm_package_attributes%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION pka_select_row_upd( i_pka_ID   IN  lm_package_attributes.ID%TYPE
                           , o_rt_pka   OUT lm_package_attributes%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

                               , o_rt_pka  OUT lm_package_attributes%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

PROCEDURE pka_lock_row( i_pka_ID   IN  lm_package_attributes.ID%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE pka_lock_row_nowait( i_pka_ID   IN  lm_package_attributes.ID%TYPE )
;


END lm_pka_tapi_pck;

package body lm_pka_tapi_pck
is




function pka_select_row( i_pka_id   in  lm_package_attributes.id%type
                       , o_rt_pka   out lm_package_attributes%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pka_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_pka ( i_pka_id   in  lm_package_attributes.id%type )
      is 
           select *
             from lm_package_attributes pka
            where pka.id = i_pka_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_pka( i_pka_id => i_pka_id );
         fetch c_pka into o_rt_pka;
         l_found := c_pka%found;
         close c_pka;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_pka%isopen
         then
            close c_pka;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end pka_select_row;

function pka_select_row_uk1( i_pka_name   in  lm_package_attributes.name%type
                           , o_rt_pka  out lm_package_attributes%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pka_select_row_uk1';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_pka ( i_pka_name   in  lm_package_attributes.name%type )
      is
         select *
           from lm_package_attributes pka
          where pka.name = i_pka_name ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_pka(i_pka_name => i_pka_name);
         fetch c_pka into o_rt_pka;
         l_found := c_pka%found;
         close c_pka;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
   when others
    then
      if c_pka%isopen
      then
         close c_pka;
      end if;
      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end pka_select_row_uk1;

function pka_select_row_upd( i_pka_id   in  lm_package_attributes.id%type
                           , o_rt_pka   out lm_package_attributes%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pka_select_row_upd';
   l_found                boolean      := false;

   cursor c_pka ( i_pka_id   in  lm_package_attributes.id%type )
   is
           select *
             from lm_package_attributes pka
            where pka.id = i_pka_id 
         for update;
begin
   viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

   
   open c_pka( i_pka_id => i_pka_id );
   fetch c_pka into o_rt_pka;
   l_found := c_pka%found;
   close c_pka;

   viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                          , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

   return l_found;

exception
   when others
   then
      if c_pka%isopen
      then
         close c_pka;
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );

end pka_select_row_upd;

function pka_select_row_upd_uk1( i_pka_name   in  lm_package_attributes.name%type
                               , o_rt_pka  out lm_package_attributes%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pka_select_row_upd_uk1';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   begin
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      
      l_found := pka_select_row_uk1( i_pka_name   =>  i_pka_name
                                   , o_rt_pka => o_rt_pka );
      if l_found
      then
         
         l_found := pka_select_row_upd( i_pka_id => o_rt_pka.id
                                      , o_rt_pka => o_rt_pka );
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

        viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc);
   end;
end pka_select_row_upd_uk1;

procedure pka_lock_row( i_pka_id   in  lm_package_attributes.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pka_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_pka ( i_pka_id   in  lm_package_attributes.id%type )
     is
             select ''
               from lm_package_attributes pka
              where pka.id = i_pka_id 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_pka_id is not null
         then
            begin
                
                pka_lock_row_nowait( i_pka_id => i_pka_id );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_pka( i_pka_id => i_pka_id );
                  close c_pka;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_pka%isopen
         then
            close c_pka;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end pka_lock_row;

procedure pka_lock_row_nowait( i_pka_id   in  lm_package_attributes.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pka_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_pka ( i_pka_id   in  lm_package_attributes.id%type )
      is
              select ''
                from lm_package_attributes pka
               where pka.id = i_pka_id 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_pka_id is not null
         then
            
            open c_pka( i_pka_id => i_pka_id );

            close c_pka;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_pka%isopen
        then
           close c_pka;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_pka_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end pka_lock_row_nowait;


end lm_pka_tapi_pck;
